title: The pleasant historie of Dorastus and Fawnia VVherein is discovered, that although by the meanes of sinister fortune, truth may be concealed; yet by time, in spight of fortune, it is manifestly revealed. ... By Robert Greene, Master of Arts in Cambridge.
author: Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592.
publisher: Printed [by Elizabeth Purslowe] for Francis Faulkner, and are to be sold at his shop in Southwarke, neere Saint Margarets Hill,
notes: Running title reads: The history of Dorastus and Fawnia.
In this edition, A3r has catchword "tue"; line 8 of text ends: pinching.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
